logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Updated code after refactoring: DocumentIdentityMap renamed to DocumentFactory (thanks to Edith Chevrier for spotting)

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: IDE build: don't include non-existing API test directory, include modules-optional src directories

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: [minor change] removed unused import

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Asset upload: Completed validation, use name/id of logged-in user as default creator value, don't rely on file parameter when delegating the asset upload from the editor upload screen. This fixes bug 39510.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Asset upload: When errors occur, remove the value of the 'file' parameter. The value can't be passed to the next screen for security reasons, so the user has to be prompted to choose the asset again.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: InsertAsset usecase: clear uload field values when upload was successful, clear file parameter value before next screen

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added sitetree entry for /concepts (en). The document exists but has to be translated.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added check for document existence to module menus to avoid exception for non-existing documents in the site area.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Menus: check if the current document object as returned from the page envelope is really a document, because the input module logicsheet returns an empty string instead of null values.

logentry.author: jann
logentry.msg: do nothing if an empty href occurs

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Pass usecase name as parameter to usecases.js. This allows to invoke the flowscript in different ways than just using a request parameter.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Updated usecase names in usecase-policies.xml

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Use separate usecase for changing password with check of old password. This avoids the security issue that the checkPassword parameter can be set by the client.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Issue a global redirect after a usecase is completed, otherwise the continuation will be added to the redirect.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: [minor change] removed debug statements. sorry for the noise

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Modified sitemap patch files so that they are not applied during each build

logentry.msg: Added method to get the currently requested document to DocumentUtil

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Asset upload: creator, rights, and title are optional. The creator defaults to the user ID instead of the name. This fixes bug #39510. Thanks to Joern Nettingsmeier for the patch.

logentry.msg: UserPasswordWithCheck: Don't try to authenticate if the user is null.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: BXE asset upload: user ID as creator default, creator+title+rights are optional. This fixes bug #39510. Thanks to Joern Nettingsmeier for the patch.

logentry.msg: Default publication CSS: added footer support, set small font for <td>

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added lastUser and lastDate attributes to WorkflowModule, added footer to default publication which uses these attributes.

logentry.author: solprovider
logentry.msg: FlatRevision: Fixed bug with getTitle() not using current revision. Migrate: Restored edit and live revisions default to "1". Migrate: Removed extension from id and fullid. This changes the content datastore, so please migrate again.

logentry.author: solprovider
logentry.msg:
Changed index live.xconf to use "livemenu" structure. If you have previously migrated content, rename {pub}/content/index/livemenu* -> live* (overwrite the old files)
Navigation Module: Fixed bug and passes to "nav" Module if flat content. Nav Module: Navigation elements for flat content. Added backwards-compatible instructions to 13UPGRADE.txt for fixing links when using the Nav Module.

logentry.author: solprovider
logentry.msg:
Working on the Link ResourceType Module, I kept finding bugs in Cocoon2.1.6, so I reinstalled/reorganized my development system with Cocoon2.1.9 and a fresh copy of Lenya1.3. Fixed some bugs with Hierarchical content while testing the new installation.
Updated INSTALL-SRC.txt with instructions based on new installation (especially how Cocoon's BAT files are formatted wrong.) Bug fixes for Hierarchical Content. Migrate: Use live revision for edit revision if no authoring revision (unlikely in Lenya1.2). Added Edit Module for entry into Flat Resource maintenance. Fixed Form Module's post.xsp to handle checkboxes (multiple fields with the same name). Added ResourceTransformer for changing structural information of Resources. Still being tested. Added StringSource and VirtualSourceFactory. The Cocoon project might benefit from them. VirtualSourceFactory needs to be thread-safe.
